Help the Archaeologist with a new discovery at the Farlen Dig Site.
Become the Guildmaster of the Veil of the Black Hand.
Ascend Furi Stormcrow to the Circle of Twelve.
Become the World Champion in the Osirian Gladiator Arena by defeating Agramed.
Build all versions of the Build Your Own City sidequest.
Survive Zacharael's assault at the Tower of Amon'Quel.
Defeat Belkas and company in his home at Miner's End.
Defeat Ledonel at the Tower of Horror.
Defeat Belkas and company on the outskirts of Porthul.
Defeat Israfel at the Valpheggi Swamplands.
Defeat Belkas and company outside Malgoraxia's Cave.
Defeat Hadriel during the Battle on the Airship.
Defeat Belkas and company at the Battle of Greyhem.
Survive Adramelech's assault at the Battle of Greyhem.
Defeat Veriel at the Island Generator.
Defeat Eldromus Blackheart at the Emperor's Palace.
Defeat Cael Vaeili in the South Tower at Farlen.
Defeat the Omnimental at the summit of Mount Ortis.

name: The Richest Man in the World

displayName.english: The Richest Man in the World

description.english: Defeat the Watcher in his Apothecary.
Defeat Malviticus in the Celestial Realm.
Defeat the Kraken out of the port of Dupre.
Return the family heirloom of Gavin Rems.
Save Tommen and his men in the Mythril Mine.
Defeat the Necronaut in the Tower of Horror.
Save Diarmud from the Dragon Hunters in Greybridge.
Find a new home for the Madurai in Alme.
Restore the light to the island of Farlen
Restore Korin Faelyn as the rightful King of Amanor.
Return the holy land of Ghar Jalal to the Osirians.
End the persecution of the Spellswords in the Plains of Zaardun.
Defeat Pale Night at the Tomb of Atzantiel.
Unite the Clans of Frosthammer under a new High Thane.
Stop the warring Kingdoms at the Battle of Greyhem.
Achieve an appointment on the Circle of Twelve.
Defeated the Validian Empire at the Battle of the Blighted Lands.
